Items.Title: For loop with break statement
Items.Info: Let's continue with the for loop. Sometimes there is a situation when we need to exit the loop without waiting for it to complete. In this case, we can use the <color=green>break statement</color>. So, <color=green >statement break</color> is used to break the execution of the loop.Consider the previous problem.Now let the loop break when the sum of the numbers becomes greater than 30.
